subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In his N.B.A. career Charles Jones had little to do on the offensive end of the court, but he unexpectedly played a key role in the Rockets’ 1995 championship run.
snippet: In his N.B.A. career Charles Jones had little to do on the offensive end of the court, but he unexpectedly played a key role in the Rockets’ 1995 championship run.
